channel.title: ~~~ need help with creating a code about funpk ~~~
channel.description:
HEY GUYS,
I am trying to create a code or what ever you call it. im trying to make a script so when you and your friend wiled a specific item at the same time they can fun pk any ware! i have seen this done on "Freak Pkz" it is no longer online.
i cant code but it should look somewhat like this:
[code]
if((playerHasItem(####) || playerEquipment == (####); player inFunPK() True [/code]
.....Like i said i cant code. so can some 1 help me code this so when 2 players wield a specific item they can funpk any ware.
i know it is possible and quite easy so PLEASE HELP ME! :)
